title: Learning Objective 3.4
stimulusHtml:
Students justify attribution of an unknown work of art.

0-1 point

Accurately attributes the painting to the artist who painted it.
descriptions: Does not accurately attribute the painting to the artist who painted it.
Accurately attributes the painting to the artist who painted it.

title: Learning Objective 3.1
stimulusHtml:
Students identify a work of art.

0-1 point

Accurately identifies the painting by the same artist in the required course content.

Identifying a work of art includes title or designation, name and/or culture of origin, date of creation, and materials. Two accurate identifiers must be given for the point to be earned.
descriptions:
Does not accurately identify the painting by the same artist in the required course content.

Identifying a work of art includes title or designation, name and/or culture of origin, date of creation, and materials. Two accurate identifiers must be given for the point to be earned.

Accurately identifies the painting by the same artist in the required course content.

Identifying a work of art includes title or designation, name and/or culture of origin, date of creation, and materials. Two accurate identifiers must be given for the point to be earned.

title: Learning Objective 3.4
stimulusHtml:
Students justify attribution of an unknown work of art.

0-1 point

Justifies the attribution by comparing the two works, using specific visual evidence.
descriptions: Does not justify the attribution by comparing the two works, using specific visual evidence.
Justifies the attribution by comparing the two works, using specific visual evidence.

title: Learning Objective 1.2
stimulusHtml:
Students explain how artistic decisions about art making shape a work of art.

0-1 point

Accurately explains how the work shown demonstrates the artist’s ongoing experimentation with form through landscape.
descriptions: Does not accurately explain how the work shown demonstrates the artist’s ongoing experimentation with form through landscape.
Accurately explains how the work shown demonstrates the artist’s ongoing experimentation with form through landscape.

title: Learning Objective 1.2
stimulusHtml:

Accurately explains how the work by the same artist in the required course content demonstrates the artist’s ongoing experimentation with form through landscape.

Accurately explains how the work by the same artist in the required course content demonstrates the artist’s ongoing experimentation with form through landscape.
